name: ALFA Poker
overview: A single player power casino game by Đorđe Vulović and Igor Slijepčević of the Alpha Production Team, released in Noverber 1992. Alfa Poker was created in the Workbench 2.0 environment (that is, embossed gadgets and all those little things that make life more beautiful) and the first thing that catches your eye is the wonderful graphic design. Mouse or keyboard can be used equally well.
